Container.Name: shelflife
Container.Overview: Manage your Plex library storage. Users log in via Plex to vote on keeping or deleting content they requested through Overseerr. Admin gets a dashboard showing what can be pruned.
Container.Description: Shelflife - Library storage management. Connect to Overseerr and Tautulli to let users vote on which requested content to keep or delete.

Config.Name: Overseerr API Key
Config.Description: Overseerr API key (Settings > General in Overseerr)

Config.Name: Tautulli API Key
Config.Description: Tautulli API key (Settings > Web Interface in Tautulli)

Config.Name: Session Secret
Config.Description: Random string for JWT signing (minimum 32 characters)

Config.Name: Sonarr URL
Config.Description: URL of your Sonarr instance (optional - enables TV show deletion from admin)

Config.Name: Sonarr API Key
Config.Description: Sonarr API key (Settings > General in Sonarr)

Config.Name: Radarr URL
Config.Description: URL of your Radarr instance (optional - enables movie deletion from admin)

Config.Name: Radarr API Key
Config.Description: Radarr API key (Settings > General in Radarr)

Config.Name: Plex Client ID
Config.Description: Unique client identifier for Plex auth (keep default unless running multiple instances)

Config.Name: Admin Plex ID
Config.Description: Force a specific Plex user ID as admin (optional - first user to sign in becomes admin if unset)

Config.Name: Database Path
Config.Description: Path to SQLite database inside container
